Typically, men’s cologne sports the fragrance of the earthy outdoors, the deep blue sea, or has that overwhelming (and sometimes off-putting) masculine scent. Rarely you’ll find a warm, fruity aroma that’s light and inviting, while still evoking your natural ruggedness. That’s where Jimmy Choo fragrances come in. They’re formulated to have a modern and fresh fragrance that fuses fruity, woody notes with other complimentary scents. These classic sprays never go out of style. Guys who wear Jimmy Choo come off as sexy, charming, and charismatic, with a touch of sophistication. I’ve searched high and low for the best Jimmy Choo colognes that men can wear anytime, anywhere — be it going to the office or impressing a hot date. Key Takeaways To get a hold of the best Jimmy Choo colognes for men, I scoured all of the brand’s Amazon listings, variants, and customer reviews. The seven below are my top choices based on smell, season, style, and customer reviews. My top pick overall is the Jimmy Choo Man Blue Eau De Toilette Spray because of its modern, clean, and romantic scent. It’s then followed by the affordable Jimmy Choo Man, which puts the iconic classic in a travel-sized package. In This Article Our PicksBuying ConsiderationsHow We ChoseWhy Trust Us? Final VerdictFAQs purple_touch_collections / Instagram Best Overall: Jimmy Choo Man Blue Eau De Toilette Spray Why it’s great: The Jimmy Choo Man Blue fragrance boasts a pleasant herbal-sweet scent through its blend of sage leaves and woodsy notes. Most “blue” colognes give off a strong Ambroxan (a synthetic aroma compound) smell, but this Jimmy Choo variant gives off a marine-like aroma. The Ambergris middle note balances out the oceanic scent, leading to a pleasant and uplifting smell that meshes well with the aromatic sage. The interesting feature of Man Blue is that although its base notes are a bit subtle, it doesn’t ruin the overall fragrance. Instead, it comes off as a soft cushion for the top notes for the heart to fade into and certainly one of the best Jimmy Choo colognes. Who is this for? This is a solid overall choice for young men who want to smell modern and clean throughout the day. Though, since it’s an Eau de Toilette, you’ll probably need to spray it on a couple of times. Flaws but not deal-breakers: The cologne sports a fairly light scent and won’t last for hours upon hours. Top Notes: Pepper, Clary Sage, Bergamot | Middle Notes: Cypress, Leather, Grey Amber | Base Notes: Sandalwood, Vetiver, Vanilla | Type: Eau de Toilette Best Budget: Jimmy Choo Man 0.5oz Eau de Toilette Spray Why it’s great: The Jimmy Choo Man is a seductive cologne that comes in a small travel package at an affordable price. A little under $40, this perfume comes in a clean, transparent, tinted glass bottle with the brand’s logo on the front. Its sleek, pocket-friendly design makes it convenient to carry around in your bag and stylish enough to use in front of curious eyes. This flagship Jimmy Choo scent has a warm and inviting fragrance coming from its woody, musky, and fruity scent and will last for hours. It’s best to wear in spring and summer and appropriate for both formal and casual occasions. Who is this for? This is one of the best Jimmy Choo colognes you can get. It’s great for guys who are looking for an affordable alternative to Bleu de Chanel, or who want to be able to travel with their scent. Flaws but not deal-breakers: The pump spray may produce different amounts at different times—it’s not constructed as well as I’d hope. Top Notes: Lavender, Honeydew Melon, Mandarin | Middle Notes: Pink Pepper, Geranium, Pineapple Leaf | Base Notes: Patchouli, Suede, Ambery Woods | Type: Eau de Toilette Best Luxury: Jimmy Choo Man Aqua Why it’s great: All Jimmy Choo colognes are luxury compared to most brands, but Jimmy Choo Man Aqua is built for confident men who don’t mind investing in how they smell. It’s a sporty cologne that comes with a universal appeal through its fresh and aquatic scent. The aroma has a woody marine married to enticing, rich, earthy tones. To break down the fragrance further, its grapefruit and cardamom top notes provide an aromatic opening with a touch of citrus. The heart boasts the perfect combination of warmth and coolness through its clary sage and geranium blend, while the salty moss and marine accord seal the deal with the scent of the ocean and rich forest. Who is this for? The perfect cologne for men who embrace an adventurous lifestyle with confidence. Flaws but not deal-breakers: This is one of the best Jimmy Choo colognes for men. However, it’s over $100 for 3.3 ounces. It surely lives up to its luxurious title. Top Notes: Grapefruit, Cardamom | Middle Notes: Clary Sage, Geranium | Base Notes: Salty Moss, Marine Accord | Type: Eau de Toilette Best on Amazon: Jimmy Choo Urban Hero Why it’s great: Serving as a nod to the mysterious designer Jimmy Choo is the brand’s Urban Hero Eau de Parfum. Using this cologne, you’ll quickly whiff up the sweet and fruity scent brought about by the lemon caviar top. You then get introduced to the sensuality of rosewood and the sophistication of vetiver, which is more prominent during the rest of the dry down. There’s also a hint of gray amber and leather, which adds an elegant finishing touch to the entire aroma. Think of it as a celebration of masculinity that fits modern times. Who is this for? This is one of the best Jimmy Choo colognes, a good option for men who want to smell masculine but not be too overwhelming. Flaws but not deal-breakers: The scent isn’t particularly unique, and overspraying may work against you. Top Notes: Lemon Caviar | Middle Notes: Rosewood | Base Notes: Gray Amber | Type: Eau de Parfum Best Everyday: Jimmy Choo Man Intense Eau de Toilette Jumbo Spray Why it’s great: The Jimmy Choo Man Intense is a bold cologne that speaks to the powerful and daring. Its fruity top notes are lighter than regular Jimmy Choo Man and don’t last quite as long. Instead, the fragrance immediately steps into the heart, which gives off an intense spiciness to supplement the prior. It’s then joined by the aroma of Tonka beans, which bear a striking resemblance to Invictus. Intense is a versatile perfume that you can wear three seasons out of four—it’s not appropriate for winter. Who is this for? A great choice for a man’s daily perfume, as it lasts about six to seven hours a day. Flaws but not deal-breakers: It’s a light scent that bears a resemblance to many popular fragrances. Top Notes: Lavender, Melon, Mandarin Orange | Middle Notes: Artemisia, Black Pepper, Geranium | Base Notes: Tonka Bean, Patchouli, Labdanum | Type: Eau de Toilette Best for Gifting: Jimmy Choo Man Aqua Set Why it’s great: If you’re thinking of introducing your best friend or a family member to Jimmy Choo brands, then look no further than this Aqua set. It includes the luxurious Aqua Eau de Toilette that comes in a 3.3 fl. oz and a 1.0f fl. oz. bottle, along with a 3.3 fl. oz. After Shave balm. The best part of this deal is the set costs less than $100. Treat them to the sexy and aquatic appeal of the Jimmy Choo Aqua all in a three-in-one package. Who is this for? A great gift set for men looking for an introduction to the luxurious brand. Flaws but not deal-breakers: Although Aqua is one of the best Jimmy Choo colognes, its marine and fruity scent may not be for everyone. Top Notes: Grapefruit, Cardamom | Middle Notes: Clary Sage, Geranium | Base Notes: Salty Moss, Marine Accord | Type: Eau de Toilette Best Fruity: Jimmy Choo Man Ice Cologne Spray Why it’s great: The Jimmy Choo Man Ice Cologne Spray is created for modern dudes who want to assert their dominance and light-hearted spirit. Housed in a sleek 3.3 oz bottle, it’s a cologne that boasts a symphony of contrasts through its refreshing bursts of citrus top notes. The heart will then take you through a harmonious balance of earthy depth and fruity zest. Finally, you’ll settle into a base of musk, moss, and Ambroxan, which wraps you into a sensual scent that’s both warm and inviting. The tropical scent makes this great to wear during warm weather and is perfect for any casual occasion. Who is this for? The perfect cologne for men who frequent the beach for that energetic summer vibe. Flaws but not deal-breakers: This isn’t the type of cologne you’ll wear during formal gatherings. Top Notes: Mandarin Orange, Bergamot, Citron | Middle Notes: Vetiver, Patchouli, Cedar, Apple | Base Notes: Musk, Moss, Ambroxan | Type: Eau de Toilette alimehhdi / Instagram Buying Considerations For the Best Jimmy Choo Colognes Smell The top Jimmy Choo cologne for men varies depending on the scent and your personal preference. If you want a perfume that’s versatile enough for any situation, then try something that opens up with a fruity scent and then settles into a leather-like fragrance. A cologne that’s great for summer takes you to a burst of citrus flavors while diving into an Ambroxan aroma. Season The full benefits of a Jimmy Choo cologne for men also depend on when you wear it. Some variants are best suited for Autumn and Spring, especially if they have a warm, woodsy aroma. Others are versatile enough to be worn in all seasons, but make sure that they have no overpowering fragrance that might prove counterproductive. It’s best to have a set of colognes that you can wear in both cold and warm climates. Style To put it simply, your cologne also depends on your style and image. If you want to come off as a charismatic yet rugged guy, then go for a more masculine cologne, one that has the scent of Amberwood with a touch of citrus. If you don’t mind having a more particular scent, then go for something that you can still be confident in and that matches your overall vibe. lanuitfragrances / Instagram How We Chose Not all Jimmy Choo colognes will stand out, and there will never be a specific perfume that’s fit for everyone. The fact of the matter is that each one matches a specific guy and purpose. Keeping this in mind, I read through customer reviews and product descriptions to find the best Jimmy Choo colognes that would be perfect for certain individuals based on these factors: Purpose: Can I wear this to parties? What about corporate meetings? Will one spray last me through the day? I researched colognes that served the right purpose and avoided options that claimed to be the be-all solution. Customer Reviews: What do people say about this product? Can they vouch for it? Customer reviews are key indicators of a great item when making top selections, especially for a product like cologne that requires more hands-on testing to know if you made the right choice. Price: You shouldn’t splurge on the most expensive perfume if the affordable option fits your needs perfectly. I made sure to match the price with quality when picking a Jimmy Choo cologne. Why Trust Us? Joe Niehaus is an experienced product reviewer, researcher, and tester. He’s written for notable websites such as The Adult Man and Travel + Leisure, often tackling grooming-focused categories like skincare and fragrances. He is very familiar with what men need to invest in high-quality perfume. Joe’s meticulous method in finding the best Jimmy Choo cologne for men includes judging them based on fragrance and materials while also working with industry experts to find what other professionals’ opinions are. In turn, his readers acquire first-hand knowledge and experience as opposed to generic descriptions. This helps you make informed decisions based on real-life customer testimonials. Final Verdict  The best Jimmy Choo colognes embody the brand’s iconic fruity, warm, and invigorating aroma while blending it with another scent to fit the modern man. The Jimmy Choo Man Blue Eau De Toilette Spray gives the timeless classic a fresh, new twist through its masculine, aquatic fragrance paired with the smell of rich forests. It even managed to garner over 2,000 positive customer reviews, which shows how popular this cologne is. FAQ The top Jimmy Choo cologne for men is the Man Blue variant or the Man Ice type. They’re both luxurious by design, the latter boasting a more fruity scent than the prior. The Ice is more appropriate for a beach summer vibe, while the Man Blue is versatile enough for both formal and casual gatherings. The Jimmy Choo Blue sports a pleasant herbal-sweet and aquatic aroma that’s light, versatile, and subtle. It’s not an overpowering scent, so you can wear it daily to smell fresh, and it won’t tickle your nose or cause you to get sick. Joe Niehaus is a freelance writer here at FashionBeans. His work can be found at Travel + Leisure, Men’s Health, Business Insider, and more. He loves traveling, a good meal from a local restaurant, and a quality white t-shirt. • Men's Grooming

We independently evaluate all recommended products and services. Any products or services put forward appear in no particular order. if you click on links we provide, we may receive compensation.

Typically, men’s cologne sports the fragrance of the earthy outdoors, the deep blue sea, or has that overwhelming (and sometimes off-putting) masculine scent. Rarely you’ll find a warm, fruity aroma that’s light and inviting, while still evoking your natural ruggedness.

That’s where Jimmy Choo fragrances come in. They’re formulated to have a modern and fresh fragrance that fuses fruity, woody notes with other complimentary scents. These classic sprays never go out of style.

Guys who wear Jimmy Choo come off as sexy, charming, and charismatic, with a touch of sophistication.

I’ve searched high and low for the best Jimmy Choo colognes that men can wear anytime, anywhere — be it going to the office or impressing a hot date.

Key Takeaways

To get a hold of the best Jimmy Choo colognes for men, I scoured all of the brand’s Amazon listings, variants, and customer reviews. The seven below are my top choices based on smell, season, style, and customer reviews.

My top pick overall is the Jimmy Choo Man Blue Eau De Toilette Spray because of its modern, clean, and romantic scent. It’s then followed by the affordable Jimmy Choo Man, which puts the iconic classic in a travel-sized package.


In This Article

  1. Our Picks
  2. Buying Considerations
  3. How We Chose
  4. Why Trust Us?
  5. Final Verdict
  6. FAQs

Best Overall: Jimmy Choo Man Blue Eau De Toilette Spray

Why it’s great: The Jimmy Choo Man Blue fragrance boasts a pleasant herbal-sweet scent through its blend of sage leaves and woodsy notes. Most “blue” colognes give off a strong Ambroxan (a synthetic aroma compound) smell, but this Jimmy Choo variant gives off a marine-like aroma.

The Ambergris middle note balances out the oceanic scent, leading to a pleasant and uplifting smell that meshes well with the aromatic sage. The interesting feature of Man Blue is that although its base notes are a bit subtle, it doesn’t ruin the overall fragrance.

Instead, it comes off as a soft cushion for the top notes for the heart to fade into and certainly one of the best Jimmy Choo colognes.

Who is this for? This is a solid overall choice for young men who want to smell modern and clean throughout the day. Though, since it’s an Eau de Toilette, you’ll probably need to spray it on a couple of times.

Flaws but not deal-breakers: The cologne sports a fairly light scent and won’t last for hours upon hours.

Top Notes: Pepper, Clary Sage, Bergamot | Middle Notes: Cypress, Leather, Grey Amber | Base Notes: Sandalwood, Vetiver, Vanilla | Type: Eau de Toilette

Best Budget: Jimmy Choo Man 0.5oz Eau de Toilette Spray

Why it’s great: The Jimmy Choo Man is a seductive cologne that comes in a small travel package at an affordable price. A little under $40, this perfume comes in a clean, transparent, tinted glass bottle with the brand’s logo on the front.

Its sleek, pocket-friendly design makes it convenient to carry around in your bag and stylish enough to use in front of curious eyes. This flagship Jimmy Choo scent has a warm and inviting fragrance coming from its woody, musky, and fruity scent and will last for hours.

It’s best to wear in spring and summer and appropriate for both formal and casual occasions.

Who is this for? This is one of the best Jimmy Choo colognes you can get. It’s great for guys who are looking for an affordable alternative to Bleu de Chanel, or who want to be able to travel with their scent.

Flaws but not deal-breakers: The pump spray may produce different amounts at different times—it’s not constructed as well as I’d hope.

Top Notes: Lavender, Honeydew Melon, Mandarin | Middle Notes: Pink Pepper, Geranium, Pineapple Leaf | Base Notes: Patchouli, Suede, Ambery Woods | Type: Eau de Toilette

Best Luxury: Jimmy Choo Man Aqua

Why it’s great: All Jimmy Choo colognes are luxury compared to most brands, but Jimmy Choo Man Aqua is built for confident men who don’t mind investing in how they smell.

It’s a sporty cologne that comes with a universal appeal through its fresh and aquatic scent. The aroma has a woody marine married to enticing, rich, earthy tones. To break down the fragrance further, its grapefruit and cardamom top notes provide an aromatic opening with a touch of citrus.

The heart boasts the perfect combination of warmth and coolness through its clary sage and geranium blend, while the salty moss and marine accord seal the deal with the scent of the ocean and rich forest.

Who is this for? The perfect cologne for men who embrace an adventurous lifestyle with confidence.

Flaws but not deal-breakers: This is one of the best Jimmy Choo colognes for men. However, it’s over $100 for 3.3 ounces. It surely lives up to its luxurious title.

Top Notes: Grapefruit, Cardamom | Middle Notes: Clary Sage, Geranium | Base Notes: Salty Moss, Marine Accord | Type: Eau de Toilette
